name: Law Office of Mark A Sanders
tag_list: employment-lawyer, labor-and-employment-attorney, business-and-personal-bankruptcy-lawyer, business-litigation-attorney, divorce-attorney, sexual-harassment-defense-attorney, real-estate-lawyer, full-service-business-counsel--corporate-lawyer
overview: We provide legal services to clients with their business, financial and family needs. We also help entrepreneurs establish their businesses. We deal with cases related to labor, employment, business litigation, business and personal bankruptcy, child custody, divorce, construction, contract dispute, sexual harassment defense etc.
